backend/main.mo: Defines data types and in‑memory maps for shipments, invoices, clients, authentication, rate‑limiting, and includes authorization mixin with admin password and session logic.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module that preserves actor data while resetting adminPassword to a fixed value.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing frontend files and components involved in admin login, session validation, and error‑messaging fixes.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of multiple frontend files used for reference in build planning.
frontend/.env: Environment file containing the Google Maps API key.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based stylesheet defining theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry point mounting the app root and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app component handling authentication states, landing-page UI, tracking form, and lazy-loaded dashboards.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminClien: Displays detailed info for a selected client and shows shipments or invoices via tabbed panels.
Form for creating or updating a client profile with validation and mutation submission.
Dialog to create and provision a client account, including password generation and principal validation.
Lists all client accounts with search, refresh, and repair tools, allowing selection for detailed view.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminDashb: Main admin dashboard with tabs for clients, tracking, revenue, history, and config, plus client provisioning and export actions.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminGoogl: Panel to view and update Google Geocoding API key status and submit new keys.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminInvoi: Button that exports all invoices to a CSV file using a mutation hook.
Displays and manages client invoices, including creation, update, and deletion with status handling and form dialogs.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminLogin: Fetches and displays client login history with loading, error, and empty-state handling in a table view.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminMsg91: Allows admins to set and verify the MSG91 API key, showing stored status and providing input and action buttons.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminReven: Loads and visualizes revenue data using a line chart, with dedicated states for loading, errors, and missing data.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminRoleM: Shows a static notice explaining that role management is disabled under password-only admin authentication.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminShipm: Provides CRUD management for client shipments, including creation dialogs, listing, and deletion with optional coordinates.
frontend/src/components/AdminTrackingPan: Admin map panel that conditionally loads Google Maps, initializes the map, and displays shipment markers when enabled.
frontend/src/components/app/AppErrorBoun: React error boundary that captures and displays application errors with options to refresh or copy error details.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Displays an access denied message when a user lacks permission.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminBootst: Deprecated card informing that Internet Identity–based admin bootstrap is unavailable.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminLoginC: Admin login form using password-based authentication with error handling and loading states.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminLogout: Logout button for admins that triggers session logout and scrolls to the home section.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Deprecated Internet Identity login component that returns null.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Deprecated profile setup dialog with form fields; kept for compatibility.
frontend/src/components/client/ClientDas: Client dashboard showing shipments and invoices with logout and WhatsApp support actions.
frontend/src/components/client/ClientInv: Displays client invoices with status badges, error states, and actions like pay or download PDF.
frontend/src/components/client/ClientPas: Provides a form for clients to change their temporary password with validation and error handling.
frontend/src/components/client/ClientPor: Displays login and signup tabs for client portal authentication and switches tabs after signup.
Implements client login via password or OTP with validation, API calls, and error messaging.
frontend/src/components/client/ClientShi: Fetches and displays client shipments, handling authentication, linkage errors, loading states, and errors.
frontend/src/components/client/ClientSig: Handles client signup with identifier validation, password checks, and submission to the signup API.
frontend/src/hooks/ClientSessionProvider: Manages client session tokens using context and localStorage, exposing auth state and token methods.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminBootstrap.ts: Provides hooks to check admin bootstrap status and trigger initial admin setup using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminSession.ts: Manages admin session tokens with validation, login handling, and error mapping using an actor backend.
frontend/src/hooks/useClientSession.ts: Empty placeholder file for client session hook logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, handling identity loading, login, logout, and AuthClient setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for client signup, login, OTP handling, and invalidating related cached data using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup with custom theme variables, dark mode styles, and utility classes for DFC branding.
frontend/src/lib/pdf/invoicePdf.ts: Generates a printable HTML-based invoice PDF in a new browser window.
frontend/src/lib/shipmentsStorage.ts: Empty module reserved for shipment storage utilities.
frontend/src/lib/types.ts: Defines local types for user, client, and login history while re-exporting backend types.
frontend/src/lib/whatsapp.ts: Builds WhatsApp deep links for invoice reminders and support messages with formatted content.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering the root component.
frontend/src/utils/clientAuthErrors.ts: Maps various error shapes and messages to short, user-friendly authentication error strings.
frontend/src/utils/clientIdentifier.ts: Validates and normalizes email or mobile inputs, returning type, cleaned value, and user-facing errors.
frontend/src/utils/queryErrorMessage.ts: Converts React Query errors into safe user-friendly messages, delegating auth-related errors to clientAuthErrors.
frontend/src/utils/scrollToSection.ts: Smooth-scrolls to a DOM element by id with a fixed header offset.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using both query strings and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions, colors, fonts, animations, plugins, and content paths.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, known issues, and required features for fixing admin login behavior.
